00009 #include "timeoutlib.h"
00010 
00016 static char cTimeoutFlag = TOL_TIMEOUT_NONE;
00017 
00022 void tol_handle_timeout(int signum) {
00023         cTimeoutFlag = TOL_TIMEOUT_OCCURRED;
00024         return;
00025 }
00026 
00031 inline void tol_start_timeout(int seconds) {
00032         // set signal handler for timeout
00033         signal(SIGALRM, tol_handle_timeout);
00034         // terminate recvfrom if a timeout occurs
00035         siginterrupt(SIGALRM, 1);
00036         cTimeoutFlag = TOL_TIMEOUT_NONE;
00037         alarm(seconds);
00038         return;
00039 }
00040 
00045 inline void tol_stop_timeout(void) {
00046         alarm(0);
00047         signal(SIGALRM, SIG_IGN);
00048 }
00049 
00054 inline int tol_is_timed_out(void) {
00055         return (cTimeoutFlag == TOL_TIMEOUT_OCCURRED);
00056 }
00057 
00062 inline void tol_reset_timeout(void) {
00063         cTimeoutFlag = TOL_TIMEOUT_NONE;
00064         return;
00065 }
